text: Awala waakwasogoda wandu wakulipeleka pakutola sadaka syejinji mwa wandu wakulupilila, ni (kwasogoda soni) awala wangakupata (chakutola) ikaweje (channono cha) ukombosi wao, basi ni akuwa ali nkwaatenda chipongwe wanganyao; Allah chiwalipile pa chipongwe chaocho, soni ni akwete kupata wanganyao ilagasyo yakupoteka nnope
